item.description:
Friday July 15th at 6:45, come beat the summer heat with refreshing nourishing foods that don't require cooking!  Dushenka will be making Moraccan inspired raw cuisine and will, of course, share the recipes with those who attend.

$35 per person cash at the door

or

Mail a check of $27 per person, postmarked no later than Monday, July 11th to:

Dushenka Silberfarb  
43 Gifford Lane  
Concord, MA 01742

 

For Questions call Dushenka at 978-369-1459
item.name: Raw Food Demonstration
